Nearby cities and villages : Teuffenthal, Beatenberg and Horrenbach-Buchen. - City, Town and Village of the world
data.text:
Chalet Sunneschyn

Schwanden

Offering panoramic views over Lake Thun and the Bernese Alps, this traditional chalet in the small village of Schwanden is 200 metres from the Sigiswil Ski Lift. It offers a balcony, a furnished terrace, and free Wi-Fi... view morefrom

CHF 90Hotel Rothorn

Schwanden

Hotel Rothorn is located in the small mountain village Schwanden, 1000 metres above sea level. It offers traditional rooms with private bathrooms and free access to Wi-Fi... view morefrom

CHF 75Hotel Adler

Sigriswil

Located in Sigriswil, Hotel Adler is 3.5 km away from Lake Thun. Its restaurant offers a terrace with a view of the Swiss Alps. Rooms have a balcony and free Wi-Fi. A flat-screen satellite TV and electronic safe are included in each room... view morefrom

CHF 105Solbad Hotel Sigriswil

Sigriswil

Offering panoramic views over Lake Thun and the Bernese Alps, the Solbad Hotel is located in the scenic village of Sigriswil. All rooms have a balcony or terrace. The large spa includes an indoor pool... view morefrom

CHF 280Bären Sigriswil

Sigriswil

Renovated in 2011, Hotel Bären in Sigriswil offers 2 restaurants. Its elegant rooms all come with free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and an iPod docking station. Rooms at Bären Sigriswil have a spacious bathroom with toiletries, bathrobes and slippers... view morefrom
